## ResourceResolver.withContext() method

Creates a new [resource resolver](./ts-res.iresourceresolver.md) with the given context.

**Signature:**

```typescript
withContext(context: Record<string, string>): Result<IResourceResolver>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

context


</td><td>

Record&lt;string, string&gt;


</td><td>

The context to use for the new resource resolver.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[IResourceResolver](./ts-res.iresourceresolver.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with the new resource resolver if successful, or `Failure` with an error message if the context is invalid.
